org.gvsig.topology
Interface ITopologyErrorContainer

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleTopologyErrorContainer, TestTopologyErrorContainer, Topology
public interface ITopologyErrorContainer
extends java.lang.Cloneable

All classes that contains TopologyError must implement this interface.

getTopologyErrors

java.util.List<TopologyError> getTopologyErrors(java.lang.String ruleName,
                                                int shapeType,
                                                FLyrVect sourceLayer,
                                                IProjection desiredProjection,
                                                boolean includeExceptions)
Returns the contained errors. In function of the specified params, returned errors will be reprojected, filtered by rule, geometry type, etc.
